item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，英伟达计划向OpenAI投资高达1000亿美元的计划已陷入停滞。
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周五报道，英伟达计划向OpenAI投资高达1000亿美元，以帮助其训练和运行最新的人工智能模型，但该计划因芯片巨头内部人士对这笔交易提出质疑而陷入停滞。【原文：Nvidia's plan to invest up to $100 billion in OpenAI to help it train and run its latest artificial-intelligence models has stalled after some inside the chip giant expressed doubts about the deal, the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday.】

item.title: 巴拿马法院裁定香港港口运营商违反巴拿马宪法，未能服务公共利益
item.description: 巴拿马最高法院周四作出裁决，宣布香港某公司运营巴拿马运河港口的合同无效，称该合同未能"符合公共利益和社会福祉"。尽管法院周四宣布了裁决结果，但尚未公布阐明裁决理由的判决书。【原文：The Supreme Court of Panama said a contract held by a Hong Kong company to operate ports at the Panama Canal failed to “serve the public interest and social welfare,” in its decision on Thursday voiding the contracts. While the court announced the decision on Thursday, it had not released the ruling explaining its rationale.】

item.title: 特斯拉说服特拉华州最高法院大幅削减董事薪酬诉讼的法律费用
item.description: 特拉华州最高法院周五作出裁决，支持特斯拉公司，大幅削减了股东律师应得的法律费用——这些律师成功起诉了埃隆·马斯克旗下电动汽车公司的董事们，指控其过度支付自身薪酬，原判需支付的法律费用超过1亿美元。【原文：The Delaware Supreme Court handed Tesla a victory on Friday, slashing by more than $100 ​million the legal fees owed to shareholder lawyers ‌who successfully sued directors at Elon Musk's electric car company for overpaying themselves.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称萨克斯百货终止与亚马逊的电商合作
item.description: 知情人士周五透露，破产零售商萨克斯全球公司正终止与电商巨头亚马逊的"萨克斯入驻亚马逊"合作项目。【原文：Bankrupt retailer Saks Global is ending its "Saks on Amazon" partnership with e-commerce giant Amazon.com , a source with direct ​knowledge of the decision said on Friday.】

item.title: 将SpaceX与xAI合并对马斯克公司而言或许轻而易举，但特斯拉却没那么简单。
item.description: 埃隆·马斯克的粉丝们和马斯克本人长期以来都在构想"马斯克公司"——由这位世界首富旗下企业合并而成的巨无霸。但随着SpaceX预计今年晚些时候上市，特斯拉面临从人工驾驶电动汽车向无人驾驶出租车和机器人转型的新挑战，就连部分支持建立庞大马斯克集团的人士也开始主张从小处着手。【原文：Elon Musk fans and the man himself have long mused about Musk Inc, a merger of companies owned by the world's richest man. But with SpaceX expected to go public later ​this year, and Tesla facing a challenging transition from human-driven EVs to robotaxis and robots, even some proponents of a sprawling Musk conglomerate want to start smaller.】

item.title: 谷歌在美国隐私集体诉讼中成功抵御数十亿美元新罚款的索赔
item.description: 谷歌母公司Alphabet周五说服旧金山联邦法官驳回消费者提出的索赔请求，该请求要求该公司就其过去收集用户数据的行为支付逾20亿美元罚款。此前用户已关闭了关键隐私设置。【原文：Alphabet's Google persuaded a federal judge in San Francisco on Friday to reject a bid by consumers for more than $2 billion in penalties over the company’s past collection of data from users who had switched off a key privacy setting.】

item.title: 马斯克的星链更新隐私政策，允许使用消费者数据训练人工智能
item.description: SpaceX修订了其Starlink隐私政策，允许将客户数据用于人工智能训练，这一转变可能助力埃隆·马斯克的人工智能雄心。【原文：SpaceX revised its Starlink privacy policy to allow the use of customer data for AI training, a shift that could bolster Elon Musk's AI ambitions.】

item.title: L3Harris公司赢得美国海军海军陆战队精确打击项目合同
item.description: 国防承包商L3Harris Technologies周五宣布，已获得美国海军合同，为海军陆战队精确打击项目开发"红狼"装甲车。【原文：Defense contractor L3Harris Technologies said on Friday it had secured a U.S. Navy deal to develop Red Wolf vehicles for the Marine Corps' precision-strike program.】

item.title: 特朗普提名的美联储候选人沃什在一家公司董事会任职，该公司正处于美韩贸易争端的中心。
item.description: 唐纳德·特朗普总统提名的美联储主席人选凯文·沃什自2020年以来，作为电商公司Coupang的董事会成员已获酬逾100万美元。该公司目前正处于美韩贸易紧张关系的漩涡中心。【原文：Kevin Warsh, President Donald Trump's pick to head the Federal Reserve, has earned over $1 million since 2020 as a member of the board of e-commerce company Coupang , now ​at the center of trade tensions between the U.S. and South Korea.】

item.title: 消息人士称，OnlyFans正与Architect Capital商谈出售多数股权事宜
item.description: 知情人士周五向路透社透露，OnlyFans正考虑向投资公司Architect Capital出售多数股权，该交易对这家成人内容社交媒体平台的估值约为55亿美元（含债务）。【原文：OnlyFans is exploring selling a majority stake to investment firm Architect Capital in a ​deal valuing the adult content social media site ‌at around $5.5 billion, including debt, a person familiar with the matter told Reuters on Friday.】

item.title: 美国拟废除拜登时期重型卡车燃油经济性规定
item.description: 美国交通部周五表示，计划提议放宽重型皮卡和厢式货车的燃油经济性标准，这是最新举措，旨在撤销前总统乔·拜登制定的严格车辆标准。【原文：The U.S. Transportation Department said Friday it plans to propose rolling back fuel economy standards for heavy-duty pickup trucks and vans, the latest effort to unwind stringent vehicle standards set by former President Joe Biden.】

item.title: 美联储鲍曼仍支持降息，尽管在最近会议上支持暂停降息
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会负责监管事务的副主席米歇尔·鲍曼周五表示，她仍认为利率应下调，但本周投票支持维持货币政策不变，仅为在下一次降低借贷成本前收集更多数据。【原文：U.S. Federal Reserve Vice Chair for Supervision Michelle Bowman said on Friday she still feels interest rates should fall, but voted to hold monetary policy steady this week ​only to gather more data before the next reduction in borrowing costs.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，迪士尼首席执行官鲍勃·伊格尔计划在合同到期前卸任。
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周五报道，知情人士透露，媒体巨头华特迪士尼公司首席执行官鲍勃·艾格已向同事表示，计划在12月31日合同到期前卸任首席执行官职务，并退出日常管理。【原文：Media conglomerate Walt Disney's Chief Executive Bob Iger has told associates he plans to step down as CEO and pull back from daily management before the December 31 end of his contract, the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据消息人士透露，Thoma Bravo正考虑出售身份管理软件公司Imprivata
item.description: 据三位知情人士透露，私募股权公司托马斯·布拉沃正考虑出售医疗行业数字身份软件供应商Imprivata。【原文：Thoma Bravo is exploring a sale of Imprivata, a digital identity software provider for the healthcare industry, according to three people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 埃克森美孚、雪佛龙看到委内瑞拉的潜力曙光，但前路漫漫
item.description: 美国石油巨头埃克森美孚和雪佛龙周五向投资者透露了其对委内瑞拉问题的若干新见解。尽管特朗普总统持续敦促美国石油企业重建这个南美国家的能源产业，但两家公司均未宣布长期投资承诺。【原文：U.S. oil majors Exxon Mobil and Chevron offered investors a few pieces of new insight into their thinking about Venezuela on Friday, even though neither company announced long-term investment commitments despite President Donald Trump's continued push to convince American oil firms to rebuild the South American country's energy sector.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称SpaceX去年在首次公开募股前盈利约80亿美元
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，SpaceX去年在150亿至160亿美元营收基础上创造了约80亿美元利润，这为埃隆·马斯克旗下这家预计将于今年晚些时候上市的航天公司财务状况提供了最新洞见。【原文：SpaceX generated about $8 billion in profit on $15 billion to $16 billion of revenue ​last year, two people familiar with the company's results said, providing fresh insight ‌into the financial health of Elon Musk’s space company that is expected to go public later this year.】

item.title: 彭博社报道，Peloton裁员11%，包括工程团队人员
item.description: 彭博新闻社周五援引知情人士消息报道称，Peloton Interactive公司已裁减11%的员工，旨在通过重组努力削减成本。【原文：Peloton Interactive has cut 11% of its employees as it aims to reduce costs amid turnaround efforts, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会重组美国会计监管机构董事会
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会周五任命了新董事会成员来领导该国的审计监管机构，其中包括一位新任主席，他曾在大型审计公司安永工作了四十年。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on Friday tapped new board members to lead the country's audit watchdog, including a new chairman who spent four decades at large audit firm Ernst and Young.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，凯雷正就卢克石油资产与阿联酋潜在合作伙伴进行谈判
item.description: 知情人士透露，美国私募股权公司凯雷集团已开始与阿联酋投资者进行初步接洽，若其收购俄罗斯卢克石油公司国际资产的初步协议得以推进，将引入合作伙伴。【原文：U.S. private equity firm Carlyle has begun exploratory talks with UAE investors to ‌bring in partners should its initial agreement to buy Russian firm Lukoil's international assets proceed, three sources with knowledge of the process said.】

item.title: 密歇根州总检察长要求中国电池制造商国轩高科归还2370万美元，因其未能履行美国工厂的债务义务
item.description: 密歇根州总检察长达娜·内塞尔周五要求中国电池企业国轩高科归还2370万美元州政府资金。该公司去年放弃在密歇根州投资24亿美元建设生产电动汽车电池关键材料的工厂计划后，获得了这笔资金。【原文：Michigan Attorney General Dana Nessel on Friday asked Chinese battery company Gotion Inc to return $23.7 million in state funds the company received after the company last year abandoned a plan to build a $2.4 billion plant in Michigan to produce key materials for electric vehicle batteries.】

item.title: 波兰官员指责俄罗斯国内情报机构策划12月29日网络攻击
item.description: 波兰官员周五表示，上月底针对该国30家可再生能源设施、一家制造企业以及为近50万用户供热的工厂的网络攻击，很可能是由俄罗斯国内情报机构所为。【原文：Russia's domestic spy agency was likely responsible for cyberattacks late last month on 30 Polish renewable energy facilities, a manufacturing firm and a plant supplying heat for nearly 500,000 customers, Polish officials said on Friday.】

item.title: 在争夺破产的萨克斯百货公司提前付款的斗争中，大型奢侈品牌占据优势。
item.description: 据七位知情人士透露，全球多家顶级奢侈品牌正悄然施加影响力，在与破产的萨克斯百货全球公司（Saks Global）的谈判中，因该零售商高度依赖其高端商品，这些品牌正推动获得优先债权人待遇。【原文：Some of the world’s biggest luxury ​brands are quietly exerting their influence in talks with bankrupt Saks Global, pushing the retailer for favorable creditor treatment due ‌to Saks' reliance on their high-end merchandise, according to seven people familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 花旗认为黄金价格受到风险因素支撑，但预计2026年下半年支撑力度将有所减弱。
item.description: 花旗周五表示，黄金投资配置正受到多重地缘政治与经济风险的支撑，但其中约半数风险可能在今年晚些时候消退。【原文：Gold investment allocations are being underpinned by a broad mix of overlapping geopolitical and economic risks, but around half of the risk may fade later this year, Citi said on Friday.】

item.title: 美联储官员穆萨莱姆表示，当前政策已处于中性水平，无需进一步降息
item.description: 圣路易斯联邦储备银行行长阿尔贝托·穆萨莱姆周五表示，除非就业市场开始恶化或通胀率下降，否则美国央行无需进一步降息。【原文：St. Louis Federal Reserve President Alberto Musalem said on Friday ​the U.S. central bank does not ‌need to cut interest rates further unless the job market starts to deteriorate or inflation falls.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚央行意外加息100个基点，利率升至10.25%
item.description: 哥伦比亚央行周五将基准利率上调100个基点至10.25%，这是近三年来首次加息，幅度超出多数分析师预期。政策制定者指出，此举是基于通胀压力上升、通胀预期急剧攀升以及财政和外部风险加剧的考量。【原文：Colombia's central bank raised its benchmark interest rate by 100 basis points to 10.25% on Friday, its ​first hike in nearly three years and a larger move than most ‌analysts had expected, as policymakers pointed to rising inflation pressures, a sharp jump in inflation expectations and mounting fiscal and external risks.】

item.title: 关于特朗普"中央选角"美联储主席人选凯文·沃什的五件事
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普周五表示，他将提名前美联储理事凯文·沃什于五月重返美联储主席职位，此举延续了总统推动美国降息的政策主张。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Friday said he will nominate former Federal Reserve governor Kevin Warsh to return as Fed Chair in May, as the president continues his campaign for lower U.S. interest rates.】

item.title: 特朗普称对美联储提名人沃什的利率问题提问不恰当，对降息充满信心
item.description: 特朗普总统周五表示，询问其提名的下任美联储主席人选凯文·沃什是否会降息并不恰当，但他补充说，他相信沃什倾向于降低借贷成本。【原文：President Donald Trump said on Friday it would be inappropriate to ask Kevin Warsh, his nominee to be the next chair of the Federal Reserve, whether he would cut interest rates, but added he was confident Warsh was inclined to lower borrowing costs.】

item.title: 韩国称美韩需就贸易协定进行更多磋商
item.description: 韩国产业部长表示，在特朗普总统宣布提高关税后，韩国需要就去年达成的贸易协议与美国进行更多磋商。此前，韩美双方产业部长经过为期两天的会谈，于周五结束磋商。【原文：South Korea needs more discussion with the U.S. on a trade deal they reached last year, the industry minister said after two days of talks through Friday with his counterpart, following U.S. President Donald Trump's announcement to raise tariffs.】

item.title: 谷歌推出能将指令转化为可玩世界的AI模型，游戏股应声下跌
item.description: 周五午盘交易时段，视频游戏公司股价大幅下挫。此前谷歌母公司Alphabet推出了一款人工智能模型，该模型仅需简单指令即可创建交互式数字世界。【原文：Shares of videogame companies fell sharply in afternoon trading on Friday after Alphabet's Google rolled out its artificial intelligence model capable of creating ​interactive digital worlds with simple prompts.】

item.title: 特斯拉股价飙升，因SpaceX合并谈判点燃市场对马斯克帝国整合的期待
item.description: 特斯拉股价周五飙升逾5%，此前有报道称SpaceX正与埃隆·马斯克旗下的其他公司进行交易谈判，这点燃了投资者对这位亿万富翁科技帝国可能进一步整合的期待。【原文：Shares of Tesla jumped more than 5% on Friday, after reports that SpaceX was in deal talks with Elon Musk's other companies stoked investor ​hopes that the billionaire's tech empire could be unified further.】
